good.message: %s had the car gassed up and ready to go. +25 credits.
%s cut the power to the bank. +50 credits.
%s erased the video footage. +50 credits.
%s hacked the security system and put it on a loop feed. +75 credits.
%s stopped the teller from triggering the silent alarm. +50 credits.
%s knocked out the local security. +50 credits.
%s stopped a local from being a hero +50 credits.
%s got the police negotiator to deliver everyone pizza. +25 credits.
%s brought masks of former presidents to hide our identity. +25 credits.
%s found an escape route. +25 credits.
%s brought extra ammunition for the crew. +25 credits.
%s cut through that safe like butter. +25 credits.
%s kept the hostages under control. +25 credits.
%s created a distraction to get the crew out. +50 credits.
%s improvised under pressure and got the crew out. +50 credits.
%s counter sniped a sniper. +100 credits.
%s distracted the guard. +25 credits.
%s brought a Go-Bag for the team. +25 credits.
%s found a secret stash in the deposit box room. +50 credits.
%s found a box of jewelry on a civilian. +25 credits.
%s stayed focused and vigilant. +25 credits.
%s spray painted the video cameras. +25 credits.
%s located the vault manager. +25 credits.
%s set a clever trap for the swat team. +50 credits.
%s Planned the getaway route. +25 credits.
%s Changed vehicles by stealing an old lady's car. +50 credits.

bad.message: A shoot out with local authorities began and %s was hit...but survived!
The cops dusted for finger prints and later arrested %s.
%s was gutted in a knife fight.
%s blew a tire in the getaway car.
%s's gun jammed while fighting local security
%s held off the police while the crew was making their getaway.
A hostage situation went south
%s showed up to the heist high as kite
%s's bag of money contained exploding blue ink and was later caught.
%s was sniped by a swat sniper.
The crew decided to shaft %s.
Evidence was later found at %s's place' linking them to the heist.
The crew missed a CCTV camera that identified %s and they were caught.
%s forgot the escape plan, and took the route leading to the police.
%s was hit and killed by friendly fire.
Security system's redundancies caused %s to be identified.
%s accidentally revealed their identity to the teller.
The swat team released sleeping gas, %s is sleeping like a baby.
'FLASH BANG OUT!, was the last thing %s heard.'
'GRENADE OUT!', %s is now sleeping with the fishes.
%s tripped a laser wire and was caught.
One of the hostages later identified %s from the heist.
During the power outage, police caught %s in the confusion.
%s was left behind for slowing down the crew, due to a leg wound.
Someone snitched and %s was arrested.
Before the crew could intervene a guard tazed %s and is now out cold.
Swat came through the vents, and neutralized %s.
During a high-speed chase, %s was shot by the cops.
A fire was started in the bank, and %s passed out from inhalation.
%s cut the wrong wire to the bank's systems and was electrocuted, but lived.
During the escape, the crew left %s behind.
The crew knocked out %s because they shot a hostage without cause.
